rules.name: PartnerAdded_Invalid
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND (4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7
rules.label: PartnerAdded_Invalid

rules.name: PartnerNameIssueOnly
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 4 AND 7) OR (2 AND 3 AND 6)) AND 5 AND 8
rules.label: PartnerNameIssueOnly
